name: Consumer Enterprises Limited
description:
Controls: 

Press E to talk to people.

Setup:

It's the summer of 1983, The Flatiron Building, New York City. Your father just got you an internship at his friends company, Consumer Enterprises Limited. You're excited for your first day and Paul, the CEO calls you into his office.

Rationale:

This was a stupid joke that came to me when I was eating lunch one day and so I spent ~6 weeks making this. 

Critical Path:

There isn't a set critical path since you're supposed to roam around and get lost in the space but this is closest to a critical path
